summary: The article explores the dual-use nature of artificial intelligence, specifically focusing on Large Language Models (LLMs), and the potential for their misuse. title: AI Chatbot Companies Should Protect Your Conversations From Bulk Surveillance
summary: The article discusses the importance of AI chatbot companies prioritizing the protection of user conversations from bulk surveillance. It highlights the growing reliance on AI chatbots for various personal and professional interactions, thus increasing the need for stringent data privacy measures.
